hiveArticle.title: How India's Independence Day Celebrated all over the World
hiveArticle.body:
India's Independence Day was celebrated all over the world on 15th August.

In Australia

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcMkBEiSCXGaUkrU2hnTQq5bjUWNbYBv1fXGF5cc4xKGF/image.png)

In Shanghai

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSrC5zACHGYUUDKDeYx4P5adgPunTJ74j4pnu7tboXWnd/image.png)

In Japan

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTYnWhzjwi3gjMNpCgob6gQD41Ze2E4RBqSiVh1SJUWtg/image.png)

In Singapore

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWZWDjiSAPXkHuC8CBqYa7FxkHBu2gffWEZAEhLvpstB4/image.png)

In UK

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmc9yRL1uwudUw9NQLoc8KGqqwHMF2tDfBYibkUvTfwc56/image.png)

In Israel

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcSVMQW8k4TgGVnQVhVjBTFHME6nq1ZXiTThdYR68v4y5/image.png)

In South Africa

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSnZLWbfLNBhUKVF7p2CGCAcRu8BoY1QKhkhoFM1HbJS9/image.png)

In New York

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdcc2tEk8N6ynhP5A6RGuGGjrbzjhMrjfrnp5Njph3Giw/image.png)
